title: Phone restarts when using "power off" option
content:
So since the latest update, I cannot shut down my phone using the "power off" option from holding the actual power button, as usual. If I hit "restart', it does restart. If I hit "power off", it does restart. Is that some sort of configuration that came with the new update?

Btw, I did a factory reset, don't have a case on, the phone is in perfect condition and the power button works fine. 

Thank you for your time.
